Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Right after Freewing uttered those words, the disembodied voice filled the 
air around them. "Optimus Prime is alive?" Red Bolt muttered under his 
breath. "We must rendezvous withe Prime, wherever he is. He should be able to 
help us with our movement." Freewing was disturbed by Red Bolt's statement, 
his use of the word movement. "Right, we should get going, Perhaps we will 
meet other bots along the way. You should look for Prime, I'll begin 
gathering salvage." "Right!" Red Bolt transforms into his Fuzor mode, and 
flies into the air, top speed. Freewing watched Red Bolt fly into the 
distance, and then muttered:"Primus help us all if that boy is swayed to the 
darkside..." Freewing transforms into his hawk form, and begins flying toward 
Africa...

--part1_20.113feedd.27a50060_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
